description.displayText:
Our family was very fortunate to have Maka care for our Mother in the last months of her life. Words describing her compassion, care giving, capabilities and real love for our Mother could never be adequate. Maka was a blessing.
She lived with my Mother and her husband for four months and during that time she saw to all my Mothers  needs, which included administering medications around the clock, bathing, using the bathroom and commode, as well as diapers. when needed, preparing meals, checking her vitals,  lifting, assisting walking and getting in and out of chairs, bed and wheel chairs, overseeing prescribed taking her to Doctor visits, physical therapy, staying with her in the hospital, and even. taking her out to dine and shop. She was. able to offer. my Mother a quality of life  and dignity in her end. days which she would not otherwise have enjoyed. My Mother. and our family were her number one priority.   She was exceptional in every way.

She lived with my Mother and her husband for four months and during that time she saw to all my Mothers  needs, which included administering medications around the clock, bathing, using the bathroom and commode, as well as diapers. when needed, preparing meals, checking her vitals,  lifting, assisting walking and getting in and out of chairs, bed and wheel chairs, overseeing prescribed taking her to Doctor visits, physical therapy, staying with her in the hospital, and even. taking her out to dine and shop. She was. able to offer. my Mother a quality of life  and dignity in her end. days which she would not otherwise have enjoyed. My Mother. and our family were her number one priority. description.displayText:
July 29, 2023


            Maka M has been working for me since March '23 taking care of my wife Sandy. My wife had multiple chronic medical issues and passed away on July 20, 2023. I am writing this letter of recommendation for Maka. Maka took wonderful care of my wife at home and throughout her many hospitals stays and emergency room visits over the past several months. This allowed my wife to stay at home until the day that she passed away. Maka took excellent care of my wife. She is kind, empathic and competent. She became a part of our family. My wife developed a close bond with Maka, and she became a blessing to our entire family. Maka is extremely compassionate and trustworthy. She took care of my wife with the upmost dignity and support.
